ISSUE.TITLE: Omnisend. We should not process events when the plugin is not configured
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.80.1 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Install nopCommerce 2. Edit any product in admin area 3. See system logs. You'll see "Misc.Omnisend configuration error" - Failed to get the required data from the Omnisend server. Please check if the API key is correct and save the settings again. Error details can be found in the Log page We should not process events when the plugin is not configured (not used by a merchant)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7478 We should not throw JS errors when a merchant does not have appropriate ACL permissions

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7472 Omnisend. We should not process events when the plugin is not configured
